words.def: (`cease' is a noun only in the phrase `without cease') end
the smallest whole number or a numeral representing this number
Plural of cee, the name of the letter C.
freedom from difficulty or hardship or effort
the smallest whole number or a numeral representing this number
Something shaped like the letter C, such as a cee spring .
a division of an ocean or a large body of salt water partially enclosed by land
the seat within a bishop's diocese where his cathedral is located
a very poisonous metallic element that has three allotropic forms
a radioactive transuranic element produced by bombarding plutonium with neutrons
